name: Boom Gems
description:
Boom Gems is an addictive and delicious adventure filled with colorful gem crunching effects and well designed puzzles for you to play in subway time! With candy style gems to smash and eliminate in each level, gems Switch is twice the fun but familiar to play. So let's get started to crush the saga now!

Game Features:
- Stunning graphics with a highly polished interface
- Sharp and animated visuals fit this saga to surfers life
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master
